snippet: The cable channel decided to shelve a show with Chad Johnson, a pro football player previously known as Chad Ochocinco, who has been charged with domestic violence.
abstract: The cable channel decided to shelve a show with Chad Johnson, a pro football player previously known as Chad Ochocinco, who has been charged with domestic violence.

headline.main: VH1 Cancels Chad Johnson Reality Show
headline.print_headline: VH1 Cancels Show After Player’s Arrest
